basics.name: Stacy Vasquez
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: Hello! I am a third year University of Hawaii undergraduate studying for a B.B.A. in Management Information Systems with a minor in Religion. My expected graduation is Spring 2022.

highlights: Consults 45+ students in residental halls to develop professional and conflict mediation skills
Teams up with business college to lead the residental learning program for incoming freshman
Coordinates two active programs and one silent program each month with goals of keeping a positive community
Monitored and helped manage $760,000,000+ in client assets
Prepared and handled forms for nearly 3,000 clients
Organized monthly seminars and client appreciation events
Ensured the physical and mental wellbeing of over 30 preteens
Enforced rules and regulations amongst 500 young women to maintain discipline and ensure safety

activites.summary: The Financial Management Association is an organization that expands members in their knowledge of financial theory and its applications. They strive to strengthen their social and professional network among peers and the business community
highlights: Plans a professional interaction night to connect 20+ college students with 15+ professionals
Acts as the communicator between 10 executive board and 30 club members

activites.summary: Delta Sigma Pi is a professional fraternity organized to foster the study of business in universities; to encourage scholarship, social activity and the association of students for their mutual advancement by research and practice
highlights: Elected VP Community Service for the 2018-2019 school year
Offered 40+ community service activities for newly initiated members to participate in
